item.title: [GRA7][WebPaaS] - Routine Maintenance
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 17, 19:00 - 20:00 UTC

Aug 1, 12:53 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 17/08/2023 19:00 UTC
End time : 17/08/2023 20:00 UTC
Service impact : Console User Interface, Git and Crons will be unavailable during the reindexing of git logs, which may take up to 6 hours.
Service improvement : Our partner communicated to OVHcloud that they will be doing a routine maintenance on OVHCLOUD-FR-1 region to release an underlying software upgrade. All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade.

Update - Start time : 07/08/2023 08:11 UTC
End time : 07/08/2023 09:20 UTC
Service status: Services are working as they should be.
Root cause: A hardware needed to be changed.

Aug 7, 10:01 UTC

Aug 7, 08:47 UTC

Aug 7, 08:44 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 07/08/2023 08:11 UTC
Service impact : 2 servers sharedsql052.eu001 and sharedsql063.eu001 are unreachable.
Customers do not have access to their database on these 2 servers
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

item.title: [GRA][WebHosting] - Logs on Clusters 031- 002-006 - 014 - 029 Bitdefender Endpoint Security Tools
item.description:
Aug 3, 07:30 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 25/07/2023 09:02 UTC
End Time : 03/08/2023 07:30 UTC
The latest bitdefender upgrade has fixed the problem. All impacted services are now operational.

Jul 28, 08:11 UTC
Update - Cluster002,Cluster006,Cluster014,Cluster024 and Cluster029 are operational again.

Jul 25, 13:15 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Jul 25, 13:14 UTC
Update - The current workaround, which is to use https instead of http, only works for MacOS users.
For Windows users, the only way out is to disable bitdefender Endpoint Security Tools or use another device.

Jul 25, 12:31 UTC
Update - Further investigation show impact on clusters :
Cluster002
Cluster006
Cluster014
Cluster024
Cluster029
Cluster031

If the file is indeed a False Positive, the detection will be removed in the next 72 hours and the modification will be implemented in the product through a Signature Update.
Please keep your Bitdefender up-to-date.

Jul 25, 09:10 UTC
Identified - Start time : 25/07/2023 09:02 UTC
Service impact : Customer who use "Bitdefender Endpoint Security Tools" may be blocked on http://logs.cluster031.hosting.ovh.net/
Bitdefender has been contacted to correct this false positive issue.
Customer need to ensure use https://logs.cluster031.hosting.ovh.net/ and not http://logs.cluster031.hosting.ovh.net/ (just use https)

item.title: [GLOBAL][Web Cloud] - VoIP Billing
item.description:
Aug 8, 09:16 UTC
Update - The second part is completed.
The outplan invoice has been sent. The CDRs are available in the statement dated 02/08. Excluding Fiber and XDSL packs.

Aug 7, 09:01 UTC
Update - The second part is in progress . The outplan invoice and statements will arrive soon.

Aug 4, 13:37 UTC
Update - As previously indicated, the re-crediting of affected customers for the month of June is underway.
The second phase, which concerns customers who have not been billed for their out-of-pocket expenses for July, will begin on Monday.

Aug 3, 10:16 UTC
Monitoring - Our team has put a solution in place, the billing service is operational and a regularisation will be carried out in 2 phases.
The first phase will involve re-crediting affected customers for the month of June. This adjustment will begin later today.
The second phase will concern customers who have not been billed for their out-of-pocket expenses for July.
This will be scheduled for tomorrow, and may take the whole weekend to process.
Customers concerned by these 2 phases will be notified by email.

Aug 1, 15:14 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Aug 1, 10:18 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 01/08/2023 00:00 UTC
Service impact : Customers may receive blank invoices for their consumption for July 2023.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

item.title: [All][xDSL/FTTH] - Eligibility
item.description:
Jul 31, 11:53 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 27/07/2023 10:06 UTC
End Time : 27/07/2023 11:45 UTC
Service impact : Customers couldn't realize the eligibility test using a phone number
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jul 31, 08:38 UTC
Update - Our operator is continuing to investigate the issue.
In the meantime it's advisable to do the eligibility test with an address rather than a line number.

Jul 28, 11:56 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jul 28, 10:08 UTC
Update - The eligibility is blocking new orders

Jul 28, 10:06 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 27/07/2023 10:06 UTC
Service impact : The eligibility is unreachable. We are investigating with our collect operator
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are investigating the issue.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
